name: Continuum Finance
description: Continuum Finance's mission is to build an autonomous system of digital asset management that is inclusive, reliable and transparent. Dedicated to building a global DeFi ecosystem, Continuum Finance is a community-governed financial platform based on the DAO mechanism, creating a cross-chain fintech service ecology with decentralized wallets, lending, financing, trading, prophecy, capital management brokers and other DeFi technology facilities.
